title: Technology Stocks Under Review - Zynga, Marvell Technology Group, Nokia, Advanced Micro Devices and Yingli Green Energy
text: Technology Stocks Under Review - Zynga, Marvell Technology Group, Nokia, Advanced Micro Devices and Yingli Green Energy   09:31:26 Technology Stocks Under Review - Zynga, Marvell Technology Group, Nokia, Advanced Micro... -- NEW YORK, September   <-   NEW YORK , September   ACI Association has initiated research coverage on the following equities: Zynga Inc. (NASDAQ: ZNGA ), Marvell Technology Group Ltd. (NASDAQ: MRVL ), Nokia Corporation (NYSE: NOK ), Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ: AMD ), Yingli Green Energy Holding Company Limited (NYSE: YGE ). On Tuesday, September 29, 2015 , NASDAQ ended at 4,517.32, down 0.59%, Dow Jones advanced 0.30% to finish the day at 16,049.13 and the S&P closed at 1,884.09, up 0.12%. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. Zynga Inc Zynga Inc's stock edged lower by 3.91% to close Tuesday's session at USD 2.21 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 2.20 and USD 2.33 , marking a new 52-week low during the session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 11.41 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 11.05 million shares and below its 52-week average volume of 14.93 million shares. Over the last three days, Zynga Inc's shares have declined by 7.14% and in the past one week it has moved down 8.68%. Furthermore, over the last three months, the stock has lost 22.73% and in the past six months, the shares have shed 22.46%. Sign up and read the free notes on ZNGA at: http://www.aciassociation.com/ZNGA.pdf Marvell Technology Group Ltd The stock of Marvell Technology Group Ltd remained unchanged from the previous day session to close at USD 9.05 . The shares of the company moved in the range of USD 8.93 and USD 9.29 . A trading volume of 10.51 million shares was recorded, which was greater than its 150-day daily average volume of 7.09 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 6.90 million shares. Over the last five days, Marvell Technology Group Ltd's shares have advanced 2.38% and in the past one month, it has lost 18.62%. Additionally, over the last three months, the stock has declined 31.36% and in the past six months, the shares have registered a loss of 38.44%. Marvell Technology Group Ltd has a current dividend yield of 2.65%. The stock is trading at a price to book ratio of 0.91 against the historical PB ratio of 1.55. Register for free on ACI Association and access the latest research on MRVL at: http://www.aciassociation.com/MRVL.pdf Nokia Oyj Nokia Oyj's stock increased by 1.86% to close Tuesday's session at USD 6.58 . The company's shares fluctuated in the range of USD 6.48 and USD 6.64 . A total of 9.83 million shares exchanged hands, which was lesser than its 50-day daily average volume of 10.92 million shares and was below its 52-week average volume of 17.56 million shares. Over the last three days Nokia Oyj's shares have declined by 1.20% and in the past one week it has moved up 0.92%. Furthermore, over the last three months, the stock has lost 3.94% and in the past six months, the shares have shed 13.19%. Nokia Oyj has a current dividend yield of 2.41%. Further, the company is trading at a price to earnings ratio of 12.19 and a price to book ratio of 2.36. This compares to a historical PE ratio of 20.77 and the historical PB ratio of 2.75. Additionally, the stock is trading at a price to cash flow ratio of 9.04 and price to sales ratio of 1.60. The complete research on NOK is available for free at: http://www.aciassociation.com/NOK.pdf Advanced Micro Devices Inc Advanced Micro Devices Inc's stock added 0.60% to close Tuesday's session at USD 1.67 . The company's shares oscillated between USD 1.65 and USD 1.69 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 7.01 million shares, which was below its 50-day daily average volume of 11.39 million shares and below its 52-week average volume of 16.18 million shares. Over the last five days, Advanced Micro Devices Inc's shares have declined by 3.47% and in the past one month, it has lost 6.18%. In addition, over the last three months, the stock has lost 30.42% and year to date, the shares have shed 37.45%. The stock is trading at a price to book ratio of 3.81 against the historical PB ratio of 11.00. Free in-depth research on AMD is available at: http://www.aciassociation.com/AMD.pdf Yingli Green Energy Holding Co Ltd Yingli Green Energy Holding Co Ltd's stock declined 21.46% to close Tuesday's session at USD 0.33 . The share price vacillated between USD 0.33 and USD 0.42 , marking a new 52-week low during the session. The stock recorded a trading volume of 4.19 million shares, which was above its 50-day daily average volume of 1.27 million shares and above its 52-week average volume of 2.00 million shares. Over the last three days, Yingli Green Energy Holding Co Ltd's shares have declined by 19.93% and in the past one week it has moved down 28.63%. Moreover, in the last six months, the stock has lost 82.25% and year to date, the shares have shed 86.03%.
